metadata.title: CVE-2022-45887 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9.drivers/media/usb/ttusb-dec/ttusb_dec.c has a memory leak because of thelack of a dvb_frontend_detach call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45887` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1005.5
No subscription required

No subscription required
